pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Arcane PubSubThis package is base on [google-cloud-pubsub](https://pypi.org/project/google-cloud-pubsub/).## Get Started```shpip install arcane-pubsub```## Example Usage```pythonfrom arcane import pubsub# Import your configsfrom configure import Configclient = pubsub.Client(Config.KEY)client.push_to_topic('project', 'topic', {"parameter": "value"})```
